mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_board ( article_no, article_title, article_content, party_location , user_no, create_date, file_no, is_delete, article_hit, board_no , meet_time) VALUES ( tb_recruitBoard_seq.nextval, #{article_title},#{article_content}, #{party_location, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{user_no}, sysdate, #{file_no}, #{is_delete}, #{article_hit}, #{board_no} , to_date(#{meet_time},'YYYY-MM-DDHH24MI'))
mapper.select: SELECT article_no ,board_no ,article_title ,article_content ,meet_time ,article_hit ,create_date ,(SELECT user_nick FROM tb_user u WHERE u.user_no = b.user_no) user_nick ,(SELECT count(*) FROM tb_comment c WHERE c.board_no = #{board_no} AND c.article_no = #{article_no }) cnt_comment FROM tb_board b WHERE board_no = #{board_no} AND article_no = #{article_no}
